nodes.text: Learn to Draw Star Wars is a 64-page, spiral-bound manual designed to provide children with step-by-step instructions on drawing their favorite characters from the Star Wars saga. It was published by Walter Foster Jr. on August 8, 2017.
A fine-art version of Learn to Draw Star Wars was published by Water Foster Publishing on July 10, 2017.
With Learn to Draw Star Wars, young artists can learn to draw their favorite characters from the series, including Chewbacca, Yoda, Darth Vader, and more.
This 64-page, spiral-bound manual includes tracing paper, grid-drawing exercises, and step-by-step illustrations showing how each step builds upon the next to create a finished piece of artwork.

With practice pages to encourage beginning artists to get started directly within the pages of the book, Learn to Draw Star Wars will provide countless hours of artistic fun for Star Wars fans of all ages.
